00029 #ifndef REGRESSION_TEST_H
00030 #define REGRESSION_TEST_H
00031 
00032 #include <assert.h>
00033 #include <string>
00034 #include <stdlib.h>
00035 #include "Util.h"
00036 #include "Verbose.h"
00037 #include "RegressionCheck.h"
00038 #include "MatrixCheck.h"
00039 #include "MixedFileCheck.h"
00040 
00044 class RegressionTest {
00045 
00046 public:
00047 
00049   RegressionTest(const char *generatedFile, const char *goldFile,
00050                  double epsilon, const char *command, int rowSkip,
00051                  int colSkip, bool matchNames,
00052                  int allowedMisMatch) {
00053     m_Checks.push_back(new MatrixCheck(generatedFile, goldFile, epsilon,
00054                                        rowSkip, colSkip, matchNames, allowedMisMatch));
00055     m_CommandStr = command;
00056     m_CommandStr = Util::getPathName(m_CommandStr.c_str());
00057     m_Delete = true;
00058   }
00059   
00060   RegressionTest(const char *command, const std::vector<RegressionCheck *> &fileChecks, bool doDelete=true) {
00061     m_CommandStr = command;
00062     m_CommandStr = Util::getPathName(m_CommandStr.c_str());
00063     m_Checks = fileChecks;
00064     m_Delete = doDelete;
00065   }
00066 
00067   ~RegressionTest() {
00068     if(m_Delete) {
00069       for(uint32_t i = 0; i < m_Checks.size(); i++) {
00070         delete m_Checks[i];
00071       }
00072     }
00073   }
00074   
00079   bool run() {
00080     bool success = true;
00081     assert(m_CommandStr != "");
00082     int retVal = system(m_CommandStr.c_str());
00083     if(retVal == -1) {
00084       m_Error += ToStr(" Failed to run command: ") + m_CommandStr;
00085       success = false;
00086     }
00087     if(retVal != 0) {
00088       m_Error += ToStr(" Command exited with non-zero status: ") + m_CommandStr;
00089       success = false;
00090     }
00091     return success;
00092   }
00093 
00098   bool pass() {
00099     bool success = true;
00100     if(run()) {
00101       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Checks.size(); i++) {
00102         std::string msg;
00103         bool currentPass = m_Checks[i]->check(msg);
00104         if(!currentPass) {
00105           m_Error += msg;
00106           success = false;
00107         }
00108       }
00109     }
00110     /* failed just running the test. */
00111     else {
00112       success = false;
00113     }
00114     return success;
00115   }
00116 
00123   std::string getErrorMsg() { return m_Error; }
00124 
00134   static bool syncDirectory(const char *targetName, const char *localName, 
00135                             const char *hostUrl, std::string &errorMsg) {
00136     std::string targetPath(targetName);
00137     std::string localPath(localName);
00138     targetPath = Util::getPathName(targetPath.c_str());
00139     localPath = Util::getPathName(localPath.c_str());
00140 #if defined (WIN32)
00141     errorMsg = "Please copy data in" + targetPath + " to " + localPath;
00142     return false;
00143 #else
00144     /* On unix, if possible try to just link the data as this is quick. */
00145     if(Util::directoryReadable(targetPath.c_str())) {
00146       int retVal = 0;
00147       std::string command = ToStr("ln -s ") + targetPath + "  " + localPath;
00148       retVal = system(command.c_str());
00149       if(retVal == 0) {
00150         return true;
00151       }
00152       else {
00153         errorMsg = "Failed trying to run command: " + command;
00154         return false;
00155       }
00156     }
00157     /* Can't see that directory, try to download it. */
00158     else {
00159       std::string command = ToStr("wget -m -P ") + localPath  + 
00160         " " + ToStr(hostUrl);
00161       int retVal = 0;
00162       Verbose::out(1, "Retrieving remote data using wget.", false);
00163       retVal = system(command.c_str());
00164       Verbose::out(1, "\tDone.");
00165       if(retVal == 0) {
00166         return true;
00167       }
00168       else {
00169         errorMsg = "Failed trying to run command: " + command;
00170       }
00171     }
00172 #endif
00173     return false;
00174   }
00175 
00176 private:
00177   RegressionTest() {}
00178   std::vector<RegressionCheck *> m_Checks;
00179   std::string m_CommandStr;     
00180   std::string m_Error;          
00181   bool m_Delete;
00182 };
00183 
00184 #endif /* REGRESSIONTEST_H */
